verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and you <S%H3423>succeed<s%> them, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and in their <S%H1004>houses;<s%>

You shall <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for you in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

You shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> you a <S%H1870>way,<s%> and divide the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> gives you to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> into <S%H8027>three<s%> parts, that <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7523>slayer<s%> may <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>case<s%> of the <S%H7523>slayer,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> <S%H8033>thither,<s%> that he may <S%H2425>live:<s%> <S%H834>Whoever<s%> <S%H5221>kills<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1097>ignorantly,<s%> <S%H1847><s%> whom he <S%H8130>hated<s%> not in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8032>past;<s%>

As <S%H834>when<s%> a man <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H3293>wood<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> to <S%H2404>hew<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5080>fetches<s%> a stroke with the <S%H1631>ax<s%> to <S%H3772>cut<s%> down the <S%H6086>tree,<s%> and the <S%H1270>head<s%> <S%H5394>slips<s%> from the <S%H6086>helve,<s%> and <S%H4672>lights<s%> on his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die;<s%> he shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H2425>live:<s%>

<S%H6435>Lest<s%> the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H7523>slayer,<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H3179>hot,<s%> and <S%H5381>overtake<s%> him, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> is <S%H7235>long,<s%> and <S%H5221>slay<s%> him; whereas he was not worthy of <S%H4194>death,<s%> <S%H3588>inasmuch<s%> as he <S%H8130>hated<s%> him not in <S%H8543>time<s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8032>past.<s%>
<S%H5921>Why<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall <S%H914>separate<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for you.

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> your <S%H1366>coast,<s%> as he has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>promised<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers;<s%>

<S%H3588>If<s%> you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> them, <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H3605>ever<s%> <S%H3117><s%> in his <S%H1870>ways;<s%> then shall you <S%H3254>add<s%> three <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> for you, <S%H5921>beside<s%> these <S%H7969>three:<s%>

That <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> be not <S%H8210>shed<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and so <S%H1818>blood<s%> be on you.

But <S%H3588>if<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and <S%H693>lie<s%> in <S%H693>wait<s%> for him, and <S%H6965>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smite<s%> him <S%H5315>mortally<s%> that he <S%H4191>die,<s%> and <S%H5127>flees<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%>

Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>fetch<s%> him <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1350>avenger<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> that he may <S%H4191>die.<s%>

Your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity<s%> him, but you shall <S%H1197>put<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the guilt of <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that it may go <S%H2895>well<s%> with you.

You shall not <S%H5253>remove<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H1366>landmark,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they of <S%H7223>old<s%> time have <S%H1379>set<s%> in your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it.

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against a <S%H376>man<s%> for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> or for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2403>sin,<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2399>sin<s%> that he <S%H2398>sins:<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> or <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> shall the <S%H1697>matter<s%> be <S%H6965>established.<s%>
<S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H2555>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> <S%H6965>rise<s%> up against any <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H6030>testify<s%> against him that which is <S%H5627>wrong;<s%>

Then <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H582>men,<s%> between <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> the <S%H7379>controversy<s%> is, shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H8199>judges,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall be in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%>

And the <S%H8199>judges<s%> shall make <S%H3190>diligent<s%> <S%H1875>inquisition:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> if the <S%H5707>witness<s%> be a <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness,<s%> and has <S%H6030>testified<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> against his <S%H251>brother;<s%>

Then shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> to him, as he had <S%H2161>thought<s%> to have <S%H6213>done<s%> to his <S%H251>brother:<s%> so shall you <S%H1197>put<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And those which <S%H7604>remain<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and <S%H3372>fear,<s%> and shall from now <S%H3254>on<s%> <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H1697>any<s%> such <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And your <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall not <S%H2347>pity;<s%> but <S%H5315>life<s%> shall go for <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye,<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth,<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> for <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> for <S%H7272>foot.<s%>
